name: Empty Hands
description:
Update: I've post-release noticed a bug where items can glitch offscreen, if this happens it can't be brought back on - will need a fix after the jam.

You perform tasks, for yourself, for someone else, who knows?

A small Wario-ware inspired game designed in Unity. All assets (incl. Music, Art, Gameplay etc. apart from a handful of sound effects) were created within 72 hours.

You’ll have 10 seconds to complete each task, tasks will get progressively more odd.

Try and beat all the challenges as quickly as possible.

The theme is applied by having 10 second challenges.

Thanks for checking this out, really hope you enjoy the game.

This game was made for LD51
